item.description: Okay, let's go apple-picking! Lots to do over at this farm-Not just pick apples...There will be so far over 47 women from the City coming over. Now that's 47 reasons to come and pick some apples...Add some West of Boston women to the mix and Apple-Picking just got even more exciting...We'll have to do this every year! So, sign up for this event and pray for a nice warm sunny day!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Apples and Lesbians
